summary:
I am an experienced tax professional with a extensive knowledge of various corporate direct and indirect tax issues. I also have a sound understanding of international and Russian accounting rules.

Throughout my 18-year-career in the tax field, I gained solid technical knowledge and practical experience in Russian and subsequently European and most lately Swiss VAT, customs and corporate income tax matters as well as international transfer pricing issues. During this time I worked both as a tax adviser for PwC and as an in-house tax manager, thus, becoming a well-rounded tax specialist. While in the industry I was tasked with development and actual implementation of corporate direct and indirect taxation policies and establishing of tax department within a company.
